label: UiRobot.exe path.(Optional)
definition: If you leave this field blank, the path of UiRobot.exe is searched.If the path to UiRobot.exe is not found Please enter the full path of UiRobot.exe.For example %LOCALAPPDATA%\UiPath\{version}}\UiRobot.exe or C:\Program Files (x86)\UiPath\Studio\UiRobot.exe

label: file name xaml , json ot nupkg.(Optional)
defination: Mandatory. Starts the execution of a local project file. The target file can be .json, .xaml, or .nupkg.
